QuestData.Title: The Mogu's Message
QuestData.Description: The battle against the mogu rages fiercely with neither side giving quarter.$B$BWe cannot hold our position forever. Something must be done to strike a blow at the mogu, a blow from which they cannot recover.$B$BGo check in with Zhi the Harmonious at The Silent Sanctuary. I wish to hear his thoughts on this matter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Zhi the Harmonious at The Silent Sanctuary in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
